channel.title: verify integrity of installed packages
channel.description:
This could be useful in some contexts:
> Debsums will verify the files on your system against the files in the package repositories (and tell you if they differ)
> Most packages include the necessary info to verify them against the repositories, but some don't
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1646925

item.description:
